tool.name: show_RGB_image
tool.description: Makes an RGB image from a 2D image.
tool.help:
**Description**
Makes an RGB image from a 2D image.
-----
**Input**
- A TIFF file
-----
**Output**
- An RGB image in PNG format.
-----
**Example**
If we use the TIFF file generated by running demo2D00, then we can generate the following RGB image by selecting the indices (R,G,B)=(1,2,3)
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/show_RGB_image.png :height: 250 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/show_RGB_image.png
